How It Works

Simping is quickly becoming a bigger issue than COVID-19. We all know a simp. The guy who does a girl's homework for attention. The gal who won't stop texting her significant other during a movie. Simps come in all shapes and sizes, but they all share one fatal flaw: letting hopeless romance take precedence over their friends. This site aims to bring balance back into the world. It serves as an opportunity for people to expose the simp out of their friends, and it is rooted in the hope that society will survive this simpandemic. Know someone who could use a wake up call? Here's how you can help:
